item.title: How ‘The Studio’ Created Authentic L.A. Looks From the Golden Globes Ceremony to the Smokehouse Restaurant
item.description: The DNA of Hollywood is so embedded in Seth Rogen’s “The Studio” that it was essential to shoot on location at familiar landmarks and, of course, at an actual movie studio. The Apple
